dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4410 IH: Cutting Passport Backlog Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Department of State Authorization Act of 2023 to extend the special hiring authority for passport services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cutting Passport Backlog Act.

section.header: Extension of special hiring authority for passport services
section.text: Section 6101 of the Department of State Authorization Act of 2023 (22 U.S.C. 211a note) is amended by striking 3-year period and inserting 5-year period.
